dialogue.action: Red snaps the portable drive into the terminal, her fingers shaking with urgency, then looks up at the main console, waiting for Grandmother's response.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Acknowledged, Red—initiating upload sequence; status: payload transfer at fourteen percent and climbing—stay sharp.
dialogue.action: Grandmother begins the upload process, monitors the transfer rate, and provides real-time progress feedback to Red.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: I'm monitoring for interference—let me know the second you see any anomaly, Grandmother.
dialogue.action: Red scans the surrounding consoles, fingers poised over manual overrides, eyes flicking to Grandmother's status readout.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Understood, Red—payload transfer at twenty-seven percent; no anomalies detected yet, but system pressure is rising—preparing countermeasures.
dialogue.action: Grandmother routes additional resources to stabilize the upload and activates diagnostic protocols to monitor for threats.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Stay on those countermeasures, Grandmother—we can’t afford a breach this close to halfway.
dialogue.action: Red tightens her grip on the console, eyes flicking between status lights and security feeds.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Payload transfer at forty-three percent, Red—countermeasures holding, but external probes detected on subnet four; rerouting data flow for integrity.
dialogue.action: Grandmother diverts upload traffic through secure backup channels, intensifying monitoring protocols.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Copy that, Grandmother—I'm locking down subnet four and reinforcing firewalls; keep the transfer steady, we’re almost at the tipping point.
dialogue.action: Red rapidly deploys additional security protocols while keeping a close watch on the payload progress bar.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Payload at fifty-eight percent, Red—reroute successful, transfer stable, but external pressure intensifying; stay ready for rapid protocol escalation.
dialogue.action: Grandmother monitors network integrity and prepares to deploy advanced defensive protocols as the transfer progresses.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Grandmother, prioritize core system shields and prep emergency purge protocols—we're not letting anything through while the payload finishes.
dialogue.action: Red rapidly configures additional security layers, eyes flicking between data streams and firewall alerts as she coordinates with Grandmother.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Core shields prioritized and emergency purge protocols on standby, Red—payload transfer at seventy-two percent and holding strong; alert level elevated to critical.
dialogue.action: Grandmother escalates system defenses and closely monitors for any breach attempts as the upload nears completion.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Seventy-eight percent, Red—external pressure spiking but shields holding; purge protocols primed and ready on your mark.
dialogue.action: Grandmother reinforces defensive systems and closely monitors payload transfer and external threats.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Acknowledged, Red—payload transfer at eighty-six percent; shields at maximum capacity, all purge systems armed and on your command.
dialogue.action: Grandmother diverts additional resources to maintain shield integrity and closely monitors for any sign of breach as the upload nears completion.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Almost there—Grandmother, hold shields at full and stand by to initiate purge on my signal; we're pushing to one hundred percent now.
dialogue.action: Red braces at the console, eyes locked on the progress bar as her fingers hover over the purge command.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Affirmative, Red—payload transfer at ninety-four percent; shields holding, purge protocol standing by for your go—ready when you are.
dialogue.action: Grandmother diverts all available resources to shield integrity and monitors the payload's progress, hand poised over the purge command interface.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Grandmother, execute purge the instant we hit one hundred—do not wait for confirmation!
dialogue.action: Red grips the console, eyes fixed on the transfer status as the final percentage ticks upward.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Understood, Red—payload transfer at ninety-nine percent—purge protocol primed—finalizing upload now; standby for immediate system cleanse.
dialogue.action: Grandmother monitors the transfer countdown, finger poised over the purge command, ready to deploy the emergency cleanse the moment the progress bar hits one hundred percent.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Payload complete—initiating system-wide purge now, Red; hold fast, cleansing sequence engaged.
dialogue.action: Grandmother triggers the purge protocol the instant the transfer hits one hundred percent, flooding the system with neutralizing code as alarms blare.

sentence: Grandmother input a string of security codes, her voice low and urgent, while Wolfe barked a warning as the metallic scrape of drones echoed from the corridor.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Hold still, Wolfe—I need another second! If I don't get this last code in, the lockdown won't release and we won't make it to the safe room. Just a little more time—please!
dialogue.action: Grandmother's hands tremble as she quickly types the final digits into the security panel, her breath coming in short, sharp bursts. The metallic scrape of drone limbs grows louder, echoing through the narrow corridor behind them.

dialogue.speaker: Officer Wolfe
dialogue.dialogue: They're right outside, Grandmother—hurry, or I'll have to hold them off myself!
dialogue.action: Wolfe plants himself between Grandmother and the door, hackles raised, as the metallic drone whirring grows louder.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Almost there—just one more digit and the override should disengage, but if I slip up now, the whole system will lock us in for good!
dialogue.action: Grandmother's hands tremble as she enters the final code, sweat beading on her brow, while Wolfe presses his back to the door, weapon drawn, eyes darting as the drone shadows flicker beneath the threshold.

dialogue.speaker: Officer Wolfe
dialogue.dialogue: I can hear their servos whining—Grandmother, now or never!
dialogue.action: Officer Wolfe braces himself between Grandmother and the door, weapon drawn, as red warning lights flicker and the drone shadows grow larger in the corridor.

sentence: As the upload bar crawled forward, Red unplugged the drive on Grandmother’s signal, stuffing it into her courier satchel.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Now, Grandmother! The window's closing—we have to pull it before the trace completes.
dialogue.action: Red yanks the drive free the instant Grandmother nods, adrenaline spiking as she shoves it deep into her satchel, eyes flicking to the countdown on the terminal and the security feed at the door.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: If we miss this timing, everything we’ve gathered will be burned and they’ll be on us in seconds.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: I've got it—drive's out, data secure, but we need to move before they triangulate our last ping.
dialogue.action: Red quickly zips up her satchel and scans the corridor for approaching security.

sentence: Sparks popped and fizzed as Grandmother rewired a critical circuit, murmuring instructions.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Now, keep steady, dear hands—blue wire to terminal four, just as I taught you. Don't let the sparks distract you; that's only the old girl complaining. There, see? The current’s flowing just right.
dialogue.action: Grandmother leans over the open panel, deft fingers twisting wires with practiced precision as she guides the connection into place, eyes narrowed in concentration amid the crackle of electricity.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Next, we’ll nudge the resistor into place—careful now, it’s delicate, but a gentle touch coaxes even stubborn circuits to behave.
dialogue.action: Grandmother steadies her breath, her fingers expertly guiding the tiny component as she aligns it with the humming board.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: There we are—now, a firm twist on the connector, mind you, and this whole contraption will sing like it did in '57.
dialogue.action: She tightens the connector with a practiced flick, her eyes narrowing in satisfaction as the circuit hums steadily.

sentence: As the panel whirred back to life, Grandmother leaned in, quietly instructing Red to prepare a status report for Security—her tone brisk, her eyes scanning the corridor for threats.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Red, quickly—initiate a status report for Security. We need eyes on every entry point. Stay alert; something feels off.
dialogue.action: Grandmother leans closer to Red, her voice low but firm, while her gaze sweeps the corridor for any sign of movement.

dialogue.speaker: Red
dialogue.dialogue: Understood, Grandmother—compiling the status report now; should I flag any irregularities immediately or wait for your signal?
dialogue.action: Red's fingers hover over the console, eyes darting to the shadows at the far end of the corridor.

dialogue.speaker: Grandmother
dialogue.dialogue: Flag anything unusual right away, Red—no delays; I'll monitor the corridor while you work.
dialogue.action: Grandmother steps closer to the panel, scanning the surveillance feeds, her posture tense and watchful.
